short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings you inspiration & motivational quotes, wallpapers, clock, weather, sticky notes, to-do and more, when you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the web and get motivated & inspired.

Let daily quotes inspire you to live your best life and motivate you to make headway towards your personal goals.

The extension presents you with a motivational and inspirational quote every time you open a new tab. You will also enjoy wallpapers that will spark your imagination and also clock, live weather (with 7 days forecast), sticky notes and to-do management. Moreover, easy access to your most visited links, bookmarks, Google Apps, downloads & recently closed tabs.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Daily Inspiration Chrome extension and setting Chrome™️ New Tab to that provided by the service with search results by Google, Yahoo or Bing, and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Reading few motivational and inspirational quotes a day can positively impact your life and increase your productivity.

Transform your life with the power of inspiration and motivation! 

Join the millions of people that read quotes as part of their routine to optimize their everyday wellbeing. Our positive reminders are a powerful, effective way to keep yourself going when times are tough and to stay motivated and inspired when reaching for new goals and dreams.

Do you read positive quotes that are motivational and inspirational?

Most people love to read inspiring and motivating quotes. Why do they love reading them, and why quotes are important?

People like to read quotes, especially positive quotes, because they are concise sentences that express wisdom and awaken motivation, inspiration and happiness. Reading them, is like eating a piece of good chocolate or a slice of a delicious cake.

Install now to positively impact your life and boost your productivity.


Privacy Policy: https://my-daily-inspiration.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://my-daily-inspiration.com/terms.html
